price: Kuma Aljani Mun haliccẽ shi daga gabãni, daga wutar* iskar zafi.
arabic: وَٱلۡجَآنَّ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ
footnotes: * Halittar Ãdamu daga yumbu kekasasshe, ya fi daraja bisa halittar Shaiɗan daga harshen wuta, dõmin wuta tanã nũni ga sassabcin hankali da rashin natsuwa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wal-jāna khalaqnāhu min qablu min nāri al-samūmi
